name: events

variableSet.name: name
variableSet.description: Name of the test performed during this event

variableSet.name: passed
variableSet.description: Whether the test passed or failed

variableSet.name: description
variableSet.description: List of descriptive strings relating to test execution

variableSet.name: flags
variableSet.description: List of flags raised during test execution

description: List of SelectionEvents, one for each test performed

name: flagged
description: True if any flags are raised in the selection events

name: rvsgAnnotation
description: Name of ReportedVsGenetic annotation set that this data is based on
